Uses of Class
edu.rit.compbio.phyl.DnaSequenceTree

Packages that use DnaSequenceTree
edu.rit.compbio.phyl Package edu.rit.compbio.phyl contains parallel programs for phylogenetic tree construction. 
 

Uses of DnaSequenceTree in edu.rit.compbio.phyl
 

Methods in edu.rit.compbio.phyl that return DnaSequenceTree

          Build a phylogenetic tree of the given DNA sequences.
 DnaSequenceTree DnaSequenceList.toTree(int[] signature)
          Create a DNA sequence tree from this DNA sequence list and the given tree signature.

          Find the least squares branch lengths for the given DNA sequence tree.
